title: Example of cognitive distortion Beck therapy model

content.question: Which of the following is an example of a thought that would need cognitive restructuring according to cognitive therapy?

choices.label: “If I don’t get all As in college, then my degree will be worth nothing.”
“My mother had a difficult childhood and has difficulty showing affection.”
"There is a girl in my class who does not talk to anyone because she is shy.”
"My brother does not like to hang out with me because I am so much younger than he.”

content.answer: “If I don’t get all As in college, then my degree will be worth nothing.”

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
